page.title: 15WESTGATE CENTRE, DUNDEE.
page.content: {*-*-*-The Westgate Health Centre-*-*-* The Westgate Health Centre is situated beside Ninewells hospital.It opened in {1978}after Ninewells hospital.It registers{14000 patients}.It has three practices and four clinics.There are 2 practices with 3 practical doctors and 1 practice with 2.It has 2 treatment rooms and there are 10 surgeries.There is a student training room beside a surgery that has a one way window so the students can watch the doctors. On a lower level there is a{research {department}attached to the{University {of Dundee.}It is the only one in the area with this facility.It has the following special clinics:-{Marriage {guidance,mother & tod,maternity, {diabetic & high blood pressure.}There is also a dental clinic and a centre for the elderly.
